mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_CANDY, MEMBER_RANK, MEMBER_PROVIDER, MEMBER_PHONE FROM TBL_MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_ADDRESS FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ADDRESS IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}, MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}, MEMBER_ADDRESS = #{memberAddress}, MEMBER_PICTURE_PATH = #{memberPicturePath}, MEMBER_PICTURE_NAME = #{memberPictureName}, MEMBER_GENDER = #{memberGender}, MEMBER_BIRTH = #{memberBirth}, MEMBER_PROVIDER = #{memberProvider}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{memberPhone} WHERE ID = #{id}
